    @Generated(value="com.guidewire.pl.metadata.codegen.Codegen",
           comments="FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler.eti;FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler.eix;FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler.etx")
public class FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler
extends AutomatedActivityHandler
implements AutomatedHandlerMethods
    FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler A subtype of Automated Handler that generates an email when a specified FinancialThreshold for a given Claim changes its value.
